summary.para: method returns the text string description associated with the error code.

param.name: hRes
param.para: Handle to the error code for which you want a description.

param.name: MessageText
param.para: Pointer to a string containing the descriptive text of the error code.

returns.para: This method returns WBEM_S_NO_ERROR if successful.

remarks.para: To enable GetErrorCodeText to return the text string description, the caller must free the pointer in the MessageText
The following example describes how to implement GetErrorCodeText.

summary.para: method returns the name of the subsystem where the error occurred, such as "Windows", "WBEM", "SSPI", or "RPC".

param.name: hRes
param.para: Handle to the error code for which you want a description.

param.name: MessageText
param.para: Pointer to a string containing the descriptive text of the error code.

returns.para: This method returns WMI_S_NO_ERROR if successful.

remarks.para: To enable the GetFacilityCodeText method to return the subsystem name, the caller must free the pointer in the MessageText
The following example describes how to use GetFacilityCodeText.

summary.para: The IWbemStatusCodeText interface extracts text string descriptions of error codes or the name of the subsystem where the error occurred.
